title: GPGTools: It is worth protecting what you ♥

introduction.title: GPGTools
introduction.strong: Use GPGTools to encrypt, decrypt, sign and verify files or messages.
introduction.normal: Manage your GPG Keychain with a few simple clicks and experience the full power of gpg easier than even before on a mac.

minor-feature-text.auto-update: Automatically downloads new updates as they become available.

gpgmail.title: Send secure, encrypted and signed messages.
gpgmail.subtitle: And all that with simple, fast and intuitive tools.

version-info.announcement: GPGMail 2.0 for Lion is out! Get it while it's hot

features.title: Encrypt and sign messages with ease
features.content: Simply click on the lock and sign buttons to encrypt and sign your messages. GPGMail will learn from past messages and automatically sets the encrypt and sign status of newmessages for you.

features.title: Automatically decrypts and verifies messages
features.content: Encrypted messages are automatically decrypted, signed messages verified. Let GPGMail do the heavy lifting for you.

features.title: GPG and S/MIME in love
features.content: Switch between GPG and S/MIME in a second and after some learning time, let GPGMail do it for you.

features.title: Spot errors quickly
features.content: If GPGMail fails to decrypt or verify a message you'll see a descriptive error message including hints at how to solve them.

features.title: Be secure early on
features.content: GPGMail will encrypt & sign your drafts, so they are never stored on your email server insecurely.

features.title: Choose the key to sign from
features.content: Two of your keys share the same address? Select the one you want to sign from.

features.title: Support for free
features.content: If you're stuck or run into problems we'll listen to you and answer as fast as possible. And the best, it's free.

gpgfriends.title: Thank you
gpgfriends.text:
This is YOUR area. We just want to show you our appreciation for supporting our project with your donations. You‘re helping us grow, work faster and more efficently.

You‘ll appear in our supporters list, after donating to GPG Tools, please have a look around and see who‘s also supporting.

Thanks you from the bottom of our hearts.

Your GPGTools team.

team.title: GPGTools
team.text:
So here we are now! our people with similar interests, who have actually never met in person. We‘ve found each other over the internet and have been working together passionately for quite some time now.

With our work we‘re trying to make security easier and better, because it‘s worth saving what you love.

donation.intro-text: By donating money to GPGTools you are supporting our work. The donation will be used for the development of the GPGTools project: developer accounts, marketing, design, etc. There are several ways to donate. Currently, we offer PayPal, Flattr and Bitcon donations, but if you want to use another service please let us know.
donation.option-title: Select the donation option you prefer
donation.option-text: We‘re really happy about any donation, just choose your favorite way of paying below. You can also just download without donating by clicking the „I want it for free“-button. If you decide to donate, please use the slider below to choose the amount. Higher amounts will add more goodies.

WE REALLY APPRECIATE IT!
donation.thanks-text: With your donation you're really helping us and our work at GPGTools, since we all try to find as much time as possible between our paid jobs to work on more interesting projects for you and us.

contact.intro-text:
We would be pleased to hear from you! If you need assistance, visit our Support Site, but first consider reading our Quickstart Tutorial.

In order to answer your questions as fast as possible, your message will be posted to our public support forum where other GPGTools users will be able to help out as well.

If you're message contains cofidential information or you only want us to see it,please make sure to activate the checkbox underneath your message.
contact.form-title: Post a question to our support site
contact.form-private: Only show message to the GPGTools support staff.
contact.sent-text:
We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

If your message is public, there's a good chance some of our other users will answer your question quickly.

steps.title: Download the GPGTools OpenPGP key and import it using GPG Keychain Access
Select the signature file you've downloaded in Finder
Right-click and select Services › OpenPGP: Verify signature of file
Check the message shown in the opening window
